name: Return To Sender (mecham, DJ Koishi, Roflcopteromglol)
name_original: Return To Sender (mecham, DJ Koishi, Roflcopteromglol)
description:
Black and White Jam #8

Theme: Loop

No ammo? No problem!

Use your high performance fighter to lead enemy missiles back into themselves. Dodge and weave through aerial gunships, opposing fighters, and waves of missiles.

Controls

A/D - Turn Left/Right

W/S - Accelerate/Decelerate

If you enjoyed our game, come hang out in our discord for future game updates!
